testcase.name: Correction Check and Correction Remark
testcase.system-out: Given Go to IST.............................................................passed When Login IST with valid credentials.......................................passed Then Login Success for contract dispatcher..................................passed And Check User Login for Update.............................................passed And Select Arrow Menu "Invoice System"......................................passed And Select Menu "Tracker Invoice System"....................................passed And Type on Textbox label "contract number of email address" with value "9999999999".passed And Click button "Search"...................................................passed And Verify Table Filled.....................................................passed And Right Click Invoice Want to Update based on sub contract number "9999999999-7".passed And Check Invoice Format is "Cetak".........................................passed And Do Correction Check and Correction Remark...............................passed And Check Corrected Result..................................................passed And Click button "Save Invoice".............................................passed And Verify Update Checking Result in Invoice Summary........................passed And Click button "Logout"...................................................passed And Close browser...........................................................passed

testcase.name: Repeated Mistake Check
testcase.system-out: Given Go to IST.............................................................passed When Login IST with valid credentials.......................................passed Then Login Success for contract dispatcher..................................passed And Check User Login for Update.............................................passed And Select Arrow Menu "Invoice System"......................................passed And Select Menu "Tracker Invoice System"....................................passed And Type on Textbox label "contract number of email address" with value "9999999999".passed And Click button "Search"...................................................passed And Verify Table Filled.....................................................passed And Right Click Invoice Want to Update based on sub contract number "9999999999-7".passed And Check Invoice Format is "Cetak".........................................passed And Do Repeated Mistake Check...............................................passed And Check Corrected Result..................................................passed And Click button "Save Invoice".............................................passed And Verify Update Checking Result in Invoice Summary........................passed And Click button "Logout"...................................................passed And Close browser...........................................................passed
